270360.「増殖する魔獣どころの騒ぎじゃ ありません！\n 見てください あの浮遊都市っ！:
This isn't about proliferating monsters!
Look at that floating city! This is a
wonderful new discovery!

270361.「私が 発見した あの浮遊都市！\n しかし アストルティアに出現するのは\n:
I discovered that floating city! But this is
not the first time it has appeared in
Astoltia!

270362.「アストルティアの歴史を ひもとくと\n 突然 空に 巨大な町が出現した……だと:
If you look into the history of Astoltia, you'll find that a huge city suddenly appeared in the sky... or that there was a mysterious
city in the sky. ...

270363.「時代や 種族 地域を問わず\n たいへん 似かよった伝説が\n 残されているこ:
It is evident that there are very similar
legends from all ages, species, and regions!

270364.「浮遊都市の出現は たいてい\n その種族や 文明が 滅亡の危機を乗り越え\n:
The emergence of floating cities is usually limited to after a species or civilization has emerged from the brink of extinction and won
peace...

270365.「そのため 多くの伝説では 浮遊都市とは\n 神々の使いであり 平和を勝ち取った:
So many legends say that the floating cities
are messengers of the gods, appearing to bless
those who have won Peace!

270366.「つまりっ！ <pc>さんが\n アストルティアを救った このタイミングで！\n:
I mean it! <pc> saved Astoltia at
this very moment! The floating city has
appeared!

270367.「まさにっ！\n 伝説と そっくり同じなのです！！\n 我々は 新たな伝説に 立:
Exactly! It's just like the legend! We are
witnessing a new legend!

270368.「……はぁ はぁ。\n 申し訳ありません つい 興奮してしまって。: Ha-ha-ha. I'm sorry. I got excited.

270369.「さらに さらにですよ！！\n あの 浮遊都市を描いた 古い絵画には\n 不思議:
And more, and more! Those old paintings
depicting the Floating City show strange
creatures!

270370.「現在も 浮遊都市に 生物は存在するのか？\n 存在するとしたら いったい 何者:
Is there life in the floating city today? And if so, what on earth are they? And what is their relationship to the creatures of
Astoltia?

270371.「一刻も早く 調査に 向かいたいのですが\n 新発明『飛び飛びピョン太くん』を:
I'd like to get there as soon as possible to
investigate, but even with my new invention,
"Jumping Mr. Pyonta," I can't reach it!

270372.「そこで！ 私が 知るかぎり\n 世界最高の 身体能力を持つ あなたに！\n ご:
So! You, the most physically gifted person I
know in the world! I need your help!

270373.「お願いです！ <pc>さんっ！！\n 飛び飛びピョン太くんで 浮遊都市まで\n:
Please! <pc>! Please, jump to the
floating city with my Flying Pyonta!<yesno><close>

270374.「この 新発見で アストルティアの歴史は\n 大きく変わるかもしれない！\n ど:
This new discovery could change the course of
Astoltia's history! Please, jump to the
floating city!<yesno><close>

270375.「ありがとうございますっ！\n さあさあっ ぽーんと！ ぴょーんと！\n 浮遊都:
Thank you very much! Come on, come on!
Let's go to the floating city!

270376.<pc>は パルミオ博士の発明品\n飛び飛びピョン太くんに 乗って\n空高く ジ:
<pc> jumps high into the sky on Dr.
Palmio's invention, the Flying Mr. Pyonta!

270377.「だめでしたか……。私の計算では\n <pc>さんの 身体能力なら\n 浮遊都市:
I guess not... by my calculations,
<pc>'s physical capabilities should
be able to reach the floating city...

270378.「いや……飛び飛びピョン太くんが\n ダメでも これなら……！:
No...even if you can't get Pyonta to jump,
this will do...!

270379.「さあっ！ 新しい発明のために\n この メモの材料を 集めてきてください！:
Come on! Go gather the material for this note
for my new invention!

270380.<pc>は パルミオ博士から\nパルミオのメモ（だいじなもの）を\n押しつけられ:
<pc> was forced by Dr. Palmio to take
Palmio's Note (Key Item)!<me 60>

270381.ミュルエルの森 南西に 生えている\n紅白ダケの冬虫夏草 １:
Muruel Forest, southwest
Caterpillar Fungus of Red and White Bamboo 1

270382.しかし パルミオのメモは\n途中から なぐり書きになっていて\n最後のほうは よ:
Palmio's Note, however, was so gurgled in the
middle that I couldn't quite read the last
part...

270383.「私は あきらめません！\n 我が人生 最大の新発見！ 浮遊都市の謎を\n 必ず:
I will not give up! The greatest discovery of
my life! I will solve the mystery of the
floating city with my own hands!

270384.「どうしました？ <pc>さん！\n 頼んだ材料を 急いで集めてきてください！\:
What's up? <pc>! Please hurry up and
gather the materials I asked for! Muttering...
how to increase the distance...

270385.「何か わからないことが あったら\n 愛しい妻 ペコリアに 聞いてください！\:
If you have any questions, please ask my
lovely wife, Pekoria! Glitter Windmill Tower,
at the bottom of the well!

270386.「浮遊都市に 到達するためには\n メモの材料が 必要なんですっ！\n どうか:
In order to reach the floating city, I need
the material from the memo! Please, please,
please, please!

270388.「ありがとうございます！\n <pc>さんっ！\n 集めていただいた 材料さえ:
Thank you! <pc>! If only I had all
the materials you gathered...

270390.パルミオ博士は <pc>が\n集めてきた材料で\nまんじゅうを 作りあげた！:
Dr. Palmio made a manjuu out of the
ingredients that <pc> had gathered!

270391.「カロリーひかえめ 甘さたっぷり\n 疲れ スッキリ スパイシー！\n その名も:
Low in calories, sweet, tiring, refreshing,
spicy! Its name is... Palmio Manju!

270392.「最近 私が開発した\n 新発明・新発見 サポート食品なんですよ！\n これさえ:
I have recently developed a new invention, a
new discovery, a new support food! Eat this
and you'll be a million strong!

270393.「うんまぁあああああああいいっ！\n 何度 食べても おいしさ新発見だっ！:
Yummmmmmmm! No matter how many times I eat it,
I always find something new to enjoy!

270394.「……きた きた きたーっ！\n 頭の回転が よくなって きましたよーっ！\n:
I can do it! My mind is getting better! Now
watch!

270395.パルミオ博士は またたく間に\n傘のようなものを 作りあげた！:
Dr. Palmio had created a sort of umbrella in
the blink of an eye!

270396.「いやったぁあああああ！！\n 新発明『ハイ！ ハイ！ ジャンプさん』\n 完成:
Yay!!! New invention 'Hi! Hi! Mr. Jump" is
complete!

270398.<pc>は パルミオ博士から\nハイ！ ハイ！ ジャンプさんを\n受け取った！:
<pc> received Hi! Hi! Mr. Jump!
from Dr. Palmio!

270399.「この ハイ！ ハイ！ ジャンプさんなら\n はるか 浮遊都市まで ひとっ飛びで:
This Hi! Hi! Mr. Jump can fly us all the way
to the floating city!

270401.「ハイ！ ハイ！ ジャンプさん……\n レッツゴー！！: Hi! Hi! Mr. Jump... let's go!

270402.「やりましたよ！ <pc>さんっ！\n アストルティアの歴史に 秘められた最大の:
I did it! <pc>! The greatest mystery
in the history of Astoltia! The floating city
is just around the corner!

270403.「もちろん 浮遊都市への 最初の１歩は\n あなたに おゆずりしますよ！\n そ:
Of course, I'll give you the first step to the
floating city! In exchange, I get to name the
city!

270404.「おおっ！ 浮遊都市には やはり\n 生物が 存在しているようですねっ！！:
Oh! It seems that there are still creatures in
the floating city!

270405.「あの生物……個体の大きさは 人間並み。\n エルフ同様 背に 羽が生えているが:
That creature... it's about the size of a human. Like the Elf, it has wings on its back, but they seem to have a different function and
shape...?

270406.「いやったぁああああ！\n 新生物 発見だぁ……: Yes! We found a new organism...

270410.「あの 新生物！ 道具まで 使うなんて！\n ぜひとも 雌雄１匹ずつ 捕まえて\:
That new creature! I can't believe they used
tools! I'd love to catch one of each sex to
study as a sample!

270412.「うわーっ！！\n ハイ！ ハイ！ ジャンプさんがーっ！？\n <pc>さん！:
Wow! Hi! Hi! Mr. Jump! <pc>! Please
help me!

270414.「この気温と湿度……\n オーグリード大陸 北部のようですね……？:
This temperature and humidity...looks like the
northern part of Ogreed Continent...?

270417.「ハイ！ ハイ！ ジャンプさんの装甲を\n 一撃で 砕いた硬度と 不可思議な色…:
The hardness and mysterious color of this substance that shattered Hi! Hi! Mr. Jump's armor with a single blow... it's definitely an
unknown substance!

270419.「エテーネの村を 旅立った あの日から……\n あなたが成しとげてきた すべてを:
From the day you left the village of Ethene I
have watched everything you have accomplished
<pc>...

270420.「さきほどは 同胞が失礼いたしました。\n ご安心ください。私は あなたに\n:
I apologize for my compatriots earlier.
Please rest assured. I have no
intention of harming you.

270421.「我が名は 導きの天使 ユーライザ。: My name is Yuliza, Angel of Guidance.

270422.「<pc>……。あなたこそが\n 異界滅神ジャゴヌバを 討伐せし\n 時渡りのチ:
<pc>...you are the one who has the
power to cross time to defeat the Eldritch God
Jagonuba...?<yesno><close>

270423.「天使を あざむくことは できませんよ。\n 長い長い間……我々は アストルティ:
You can't mock the angels. For a long, long
time we have been looking at all of Astoltia
from the sky.

270424.「あなたの これまでの行いは 称賛に値します。\n ……まさしく 英雄の名に\n:
What you have done so far is commendable. You
are truly worthy of the name of hero.

270425.「ならばこそ 私は あなたを……: Then that's why I'm here. I want you to...

270426.「天星郷 フォーリオンへと 導きましょう。: Let us lead you to Heaven, to Fourion.

270427.「今 この世界は 神々の守りを失った状態……\n あなたには 世界を守ることがで:
Now that the world has lost the protection of
the gods... we need you to receive the great
power that can protect the world.

270428.「ただし 偉大なるチカラへ 至る道には\n 厳しい試練が 待ち受けています。:
However, severe trials await on
the road to great power.

270429.「私は 導きの天使の役目ゆえ\n 試練を手助けすることは できませんが\n あな:
In my role as angel of guidance, I cannot help
you with your trials, but I know you will get
through them.

270430.「……永きにわたる アストルティアの歴史に\n さんぜんと輝く きら星のごとき…:
Heroes who saved the world and shone like
stars in the long history of Astoltia.

270431.「その中でも もっとも偉大な功績を挙げた者\n ……英雄の中の英雄である あなた:
The greatest of them all, the one who has done
the most... the hero among heroes, you are the
one who deserves the greatest power.

270432.「天星郷へ おいでなさい <pc>。\n 私たち 天使のもとで 試練を受け\n:
Come to Heaven <pc>. Come to us, the
angels, for trials and to reach new
heights.

270433.「まずは あなたに 選ばれし者の あかし……\n 魂の燭台を 授けましょう。:
First, let us bestow upon you the testimony of
the Chosen One, the Soul Candle.

270434.<pc>は ユーライザから\n魂の燭台を 受け取った！:
<pc> received the Soul Candle from
Yuliza!

270435.「その 魂の燭台が あれば\n 私の仲間の天使たちに 攻撃されることは\n あり:
With that Soul Candle, you will not be
attacked by my companion angels.

270436.「天星郷で 偉大なるチカラへと\n 至るための試練が あなたを待っています。\n:
In Heaven, trials await you to attain
greatness. Now, pray to the Soul Candle.

270437.魂の燭台に 祈りを 捧げてみますか？<yesno><close>: Say a Prayer to the Soul Candle?<yesno><close>

270438.「ためらうことは ありません。\n さあ 魂の燭台に 祈りを捧げ\n はるか 天:
There is no need to hesitate. Come, pray to
the Soul Candle and you will be led to Heaven.<yesno><close>

270442.「アストルティアの者か。\n もしや……: Are you from Astoltia? If you are...

270443.「そなたも 魂の燭台を 持っているのか？<yesno><close>: Do you, too, hold the Soul Candle?<yesno><close>

270444.<pc>は 自分の 魂の燭台を\n見せようとした……。:
<pc> wanted to show his Soul
Candle...

270445.しかし <pc>の 魂の燭台は\nどこにも見当たらない。どうやら\n墜落した時に:
But <pc>'s Soul Candle is nowhere to
be found. Apparently it was dropped in the
crash.

270446.<pc>は 自分の 魂の燭台を\n落としてしまったと 説明した！:
<pc> explained that he had dropped
his Soul Candle!

270448.「俺の名は ラダ・ガート。\n そなたの名は？: My name is Lada Gart. What is your name?

270449.「……そなえの場へ 向かうぞ。\n ついてこい <pc>。:
I'm headed to the Place of Preparation.
Follow me, <pc>.

270450.「ヘルヴェルという天使が 言っていた\n 戦士の儀礼場とは 下にある広場のことか:
That angel Helvel mentioned something called
the Court of Warriors in the area below?
....Hm?

270455.「……心配ない！\n 魂の燭台も 俺も 無事だ！: Don't worry! Soul Candle and I are safe!

270456.「それより……\n やはり ここが 戦士の儀礼場のようだ。:
More importantly...after all, this seems to be
the Court of Warriors.

270457.「<pc>！ 崖を下りるのは 危ない！\n その先の 扉から\n 洞くつを通って:
<pc>! It's not safe to go down the
cliff! Go through the doorway and come down
through the cave!

270462.「今度は こちらから いかせてもらう！\n いざ……勝負っ！: This time, I'll do it myself! Let's win!

270463.<center>四天の星巡りに 挑みし者たちよ\n汝らは 見事に おのれの強さを:
Those who have challenged the Four Heavenly
Trials have shown their strength

270464.<center>白灰の試練場 戦士の儀礼の 守護者として\n汝らの勝利を 讃えよ:
As guardian of the White Ash Trial's Court of
Warriors, I commend you for your victory...

270466.「みな そなたの おかげだ\n <cs_pchero>。\n ……足を引っ張って:
It's all thanks to you <cs_pchero>.
I'm sorry for dragging you down.

270467.「昔……魔祖の血族と呼ばれる 厄介な連中と\n 戦ったことが あってな……。\n:
I once fought against a troublesome group of
people called the Demon Lord's bloodline, and
I have an old wound from that time.

270468.「大事な時に限って こうして痛み\n いつまでも 己の愚かさを\n つきつけてく:
It's only when it's important that I feel pain
like this... That I confront my own stupidity...

270469.「……すまん <cs_pchero>。\n このような話 退屈だったな。:
...sorry <cs_pchero>. Stories like this
one... Boring, I know.

270470.「この場で なすべきことは\n すべて 片付けたようだ。\n いったん そなえの:
It seems that all business has been taken care
of in this place. Make your way back to the
Place of Preparation.

270471.<cs_pchero>と ラダ・ガートは\n戦士の儀礼場を 後にし\nそなえの場:
<cs_pchero> and Lada Gart left the Court
of Warriors and returned to the Place of
Preparation...

270472.「ヘルヴェルという天使は\n 天使たちの暮らす 神都フォーリオンから\n まだ:
It seems that an angel named Helvel has not
yet returned from Celestial City Fourion,
where the angels live.

270473.「魂の燭台を かかげれば 天使の都へ行ける。\n 俺は すでに 行ったことがある:
You can get to the City of Angels by holding
the Soul Candle. I've already been there.
<pc> You can try it too.

270474.魂の燭台を かかげてみますか？<yesno><close>: Would you like to hold up the Soul Candle?<yesno><close>

270475.「案ずるな 俺も いっしょに 行く。\n <pc>。\n 魂の燭台を かかげてみ:
Don't worry, I'll go with you. <pc>.
Hold up the Soul Candle.<yesno><close>.

270477.「……ここが 神都フォーリオンだ。 \n あいもかわらず いけすかん場所だ。:
This is the Celestial City Fourion. It's still
a bad place.

270478.「<pc>。\n ヘルヴェルは 中にいるはずだ。\n 行くぞ。:
<pc>. Helvel should be inside. Let's
go.

270913.「おや……？\n キミも 天使たちに 捕まったのかい？\n ラダ・ガート。: Oh...? Did the angels get you, too? Lada Gart.

270914.「………ああ。お前もか フォステイル。\n 死んだ後まで こき使われるとはな。\:
...Oh. You too, Fostail. I never thought I'd be pushed around after I'm dead. But now that I've accepted the job, I'm going to
finish it.

270915.「そうだ。こいつを 紹介しておこう。\n 白灰の試練場で 会った\n <pc>…:
Yes, that's right. Let me introduce you to
this person. I met them at the White
Ash Trials.

270916.「やあ……ひさしぶりだね。\n キミなら きっと 英雄のひとりとして\n 選ばれ:
Hey...it's been a while. I knew you would be
chosen as one of the heroes <pc>.

270917.「そなたは 現代のアストルティアに\n 生を受けた者では なかったのか？\n 何:
Were you not born in modern Astoltia? Why did
Fostail...

270918.「さあ なぜだろうね？ ふふっ……。\n ご想像に おまかせするよ。\n ねえ:
I wonder why? Hmmm... I'll leave that to your
imagination. Hey <pc>.

270919.「ただ者ではないと 感じていたが\n やはり そなたは\n フォステイルが 認め:
I had a feeling you were something else, but I
didn't know you were someone Fostail would
approve of.

270920.「偉大なる功績を 成しとげたる 英雄が\n 死を迎えしとき……導きの天使が舞い降:
When a hero dies, having accomplished great
deeds, an angel descends to guide him back to
Heaven...

270921.「ただの伝説だと 思っていたけれど……\n 実際に この地で さまざまな時代の英:
I thought it was just a legend, but... when I actually met heroes from different eras in this place, I knew the legend was true. I've
learned.

270922.「どうやら 無事に\n 最初の試練を 乗り越えたようだな。:
Looks like you made it through the first trial
without incident.

270923.「そりゃ ラダ・ガートが 一緒なんだ。\n うしろに くっついてりゃ カンタンだ:
That's because Lada Gart is with him. It's
easy if you're attached to the back.

270924.「クチを つつしめ アルビデ。\n この者たちが 試練を乗り越えたことは\n 審:
Be quiet, Albide. I, the Angel of Judgement,
have acknowledged that these people have
passed their trials.

270925.「だが……\n この者は 試練に挑む前に\n 魂の燭台を 紛失してしまった。:
But... this one lost their Soul Candle before
they could attempt the trial.

270926.「己のチカラで 魂の燭台を 見つけだし\n 白灰の試練を 乗り越えたようだが こ:
It seems you have found the Soul Candle by your own strength and overcame the White Ash Trial, but this is a situation that could
shake the very foundations of the Four Heavenly Trials.

270927.「<pc>が\n 魂の燭台を なくした……！？\n まことですか ヘルヴェルお姉:
<pc> has lost their Soul Candle...! Is
it true, Sister Helvel!

270928.「公私は わきまえたまえ。ユーライザ。:
Keep your public and private matters in
mind. Yuliza.

270929.「……魂の燭台 紛失の件については\n 天使長に ご相談に うかがったが\n ご:
...I went to consult with the Archangel about the missing Soul Candle, but they were not available, so I have not yet reached
a conclusion.

270930.「天使長より ご判断が下るまで\n <pc>には 試練に挑まず\n 待機している:
I have instructed <pc> to stand by
and not attempt the trials until the Archangel
makes a decision.

270931.「審判の天使に 待機を命じられていたなら\n そもそも 試練への挑戦権が ない。:
If they were ordered to stand by the Angel of Judgement, then they had no right to challenge the trials in the first place.
Wouldn't victory at the White Ash Trial be invalid?

270933.「待て！ 戦士の儀礼場の 謎かけは\n すべて <pc>が 解いてくれたのだ！\:
Wait! <pc> solved everything in
the Court of Warriors! I merely helped them!

270934.「戦士の儀礼場の 守護者との戦いでも\n 俺を かばってくれたのだ！\n すべて:
Against the court's guardian, <pc>
protected me! It's all thanks to them!

270935.「さすが 英雄ラダ・ガートは 寛大だ。\n かような 不心得者を かばうとは！:
The heroic Lada Gart is indeed generous.
Covering for such an imposter!

270936.「少しばかり 調べたのですが……\n 我らが盟主 女神ルティアナ様を 死に\n:
I did a little research and found that it was
<pc> that caused the death of our
ally, the Goddess Lutiana.

270937.「ルティアナ様を 死に……！？\n それは まことなのですか！？: You let Lady Lutiana die...! Is that true?

270938.「そうとも！ 偉大なる 大魔王\n <pc>殿は\n 女神ルティアナ様を 死なせ:
Yes, yes! The Great Demon King <pc>
caused the death of Goddess Lutiana!

270939.「幾度か 世界を救った者だとしても\n 我らが盟主を 犠牲にした者を\n 英雄と:
They may have saved the world a few times,
but how can they be considered a hero if
they sacrificed our allies!

270940.「たしかに……。\n 今 大人しくしているのは\n 巧妙な ワナかも しれないな:
It's true... the fact that they're quiet now
could be a clever trap...

270941.「ルティアナ様を 死なせておいて\n よくも フォーリオンに やってこれましたね:
How dare you come to Fourion after you left
Lady Lutiana to die! You must be driven out
immediately!

270942.「妄言も たいがいに なさい！\n 英雄の選定は 天使長様が 決めたことと\n:
Don't be so paranoid! You know as
well as I do that the selection of heroes is
decided by the Archangel!

270945.<center>よい ヘルヴェル\n先刻の そなたからの報告……\n使いの者より:
Good Helvel, I have heard your report
earlier... from the messenger

270947.<center>魂の燭台を なくしたというのに\n最初の試練を 乗り越えるとは\:
To get through the first trial after losing
the Soul Candle... that's quite a feat

270948.<center>女神ルティアナをも しのぐ チカラの持ち主が\n四天の星巡りに:
To think that one with the power to surpass
Goddess Lutiana would challenge the four stars
of heaven. Helvel, disregard the Soul Candle

270950.<center><pc> ラダ・ガート フォステイル\n……そなたら ３名を く:
<pc>, Lada Gart, Fostail, in addition
to you three, there are a total of 10 heroes
chosen for the tour of the four heavenly stars

270951.<center>汝ら １０名が そろって\nすべての試練を 乗り越え\n私と ま:
I look forward to the day when all ten of you
will have passed all your trials and come face
to face with me

270952.「<pc>。\n 天使長の 寛大な措置に 感謝したまえ。\n それでは……:
<pc>. Thank the Archangel for their
generous measure. Now then...

270953.「白灰の試練場を 乗り越えし ふたりに\n 私 審判の天使 ヘルヴェルが\n 祝:
I, the Angel of Judgement, Helvel, bless you
both as you pass through the White Ash
Trials...

270954.<pc>が持つ\n魂の燭台に 炎が灯った！:
The Soul Candle held by <pc> has been
lit!

270955.「……これで 終わりではない。\n 貴公ら 英雄のために用意された 試練場は\n:
...This is not the end. There are a total of
four trials prepared for you heroes.

270956.「その すべてを 乗り越えることが\n 四天の星巡りなのだ。:
Getting through it all is the Four Heavenly
Trials.

270957.「神都の外に おのおのの試練場へ 通じる\n ゲートがある。\n 残り ３つの試:
There is a gate leading to the corresponding
trial site outside of the capital. Challenge
all the remaining three trials.

270958.「ひとつ 試練を乗り越えるごとに\n 貴公らの魂は さらなる高みへと昇華する。:
Each trial will raise your spirits to a Higher
Level.

270959.「試練を乗り越えた者には\n 審判の天使が 魂の燭台に 炎を灯す。\n そうして:
For those who have survived the trials, the Angel of Judgement will light a flame on the Soul Candle. And so, when the four flames are
won...

270960.「貴公らは 再び 天使長に 相まみえ\n 四天の星巡りの目的……この地へと導かれ:
You will once again meet the Archangel and learn the true purpose of the Four Heavenly Trials... the true meaning of what brought you
to this place.

270961.「その 四天の星巡りとやらは\n 残り ３つだそうだけど……\n どこから始めて:
I heard that there are only three Four
Heavenly Trials left, but... where do I start?

270963.「では 私は 先に行かせてもらうよ。\n ……ふたりとも また会おう。: Well, I'll go first. I'll see you both again.

270964.「いまだ 生ある者を 英雄として招くのは\n 特例中の 特例。\n ユーライザの:
It is a special exception to invite a living
person to be a hero. It was a strong
recommendation from Yuliza.

270965.「今後は いっそう 行いに気をつけたまえ。\n ユーライザの信頼を 裏切るならば:
From now on, be more careful in your conduct.
I will not forgive you if you betray Yuliza's
trust. ...Good <pc>.

270967.「これは 始まりの１歩に すぎません。\n 続く ３つの試練は\n いっそう 厳:
This is just the beginning. The next three
trials will be even tougher.

270968.「私は 貴方の 導きの天使。\n ……なればこそ 貴方の行く道を\n 輝かしき光:
I am your guiding angel. I pray that a bright
light will shine on your path.

270969.「俺も 次の試練へ 旅立つ。: I'm off to the next trial.

270970.「……白灰の試練場で 過ごした時間。\n 懐かしき友と 気ままに旅した\n あの:
...the time I spent at the White Ash Trials. I
remembered those days when I traveled freely
with my old friends.

270971.「そなたに 会えたこと 感謝している。\n ……<pc>。:
I am grateful to have met you.
...<pc>.

270972.「すべての試練を 乗り越え また会おう。\n では さらばだ。:
We will overcome all trials and meet again.
Farewell, then.

270973.「この場所は そなえの場……と\n 呼ばれているそうだ。:
This place is called...the Place of
Preparation, I believe.

270974.「……審判の天使よ！ 急用だ！！\n 出てこいっ！: ...Angel of Judgement! It's urgent! Come out!

270975.「みだりに 大声を 出さぬように。\n ラダ・ガート。:
Don't raise your voice for no
reason. Lada Gart.

270976.「そちらの者。貴公は いったい……？: You. Who in the world are you?

270977.「我が名は ヘルヴェル。\n ここ 白灰の試練場を 司る\n 審判の天使だ。:
My name is Helvel. I am the Angel of Judgement
over the White Ash Trials.

270978.「見れば いまだ 人としての生を\n まっとうして いないようだが……。\n ど:
It seems to me that you have not yet lived a
full human life... so how did you end up here?

270980.「ユーライザの 強い推薦で\n まだ 生きているのに 特例で召喚された\n ……:
He was summoned by special exception even though he is still alive due to Yuliza's strong recommendation... and he is a Great
Demon King.

270982.「特例とはいえ 英雄は 英雄。\n 白灰の試練場へ ようこそ。\n <pc>。:
A hero is a hero, albeit a special case.
Welcome to the White Ash Trials.
<pc>.

270983.「救世の英雄である 貴公に\n これより 我らからの恩寵を 授けよう。:
You are the hero of our salvation, and now we
bestow upon you our grace.

270984.「四天の星巡りに 挑むがよい。: You may take on the Four Heavenly Trials.

270985.「人智を超えた 偉大なるチカラを\n 手に入れることが できるのは\n 四天の星:
Only those who have overcome the Four Heavenly
Trials can receive the great power that
transcends human understanding.

270986.「この そなえの場にある 試みの門から出て\n 試みの荒野を たいまつに沿って:
If you leave through the Trial Gate and follow
the torches through the Wilderness of Trials,
you'll arrive at the Court of Warriors.

270987.「戦士の儀礼場の中央 試みの祭壇にて\n 試練を乗り越えよ。さすれば その魂の燭:
Survive the trials in the Court of Warriors in
the Altar of Trials in its center. Prove your
victory to me by lighting your Soul Candle.

270988.「……そして <pc>。\n 貴公は いまだ 命ある身ゆえ\n アストルティアへ:
...and <pc>. You are still alive and
therefore allowed to return to Astoltia.

270989.「魂の燭台に 祈りを捧げれば\n 白灰の試練場と アストルティアを\n 自在に:
By praying to the Soul Candle, one can travel
between the White Ash Trials and Astoltia at
will.

270990.「魂の燭台は 貴公らの命にも等しき\n 大切なものだ。\n ゆめゆめ 粗末に 扱:
The Soul Candle is as precious as your lives.
Do not treat it lightly.

270991.「お前たちを呼んだのは そのことだ。: That's what I called you here for.

270992.「<pc>は ここに 来る途中で\n 魂の燭台を なくしたらしい。:
I heard that <pc> lost their
Soul Candle on the way here.

270993.「魂の燭台が 試練に 欠かせぬというなら\n こいつに 新しいのを やってくれ。:
If the Soul Candle is essential to the trial,
then give them a new one.

270994.「魂の燭台を なくしただと！？\n しかも 魔族の首領だっていうじゃないか！\n:
You lost the Soul Candle? And you're the
leader of a demon tribe! How can such a
person be a hero?

270995.「ガートラント王国 建国の祖 ラダ・ガートは\n ともかく……。\n あんなヤツ:
Aside from Lada Gart, the founder of the
Kingdom of Gartlant, can we really call that
person a hero?

270997.「……なるほど。\n つまり 到着時に 事故があったのだな。\n 同胞たちの暴言:
I see. So there was an accident on arrival.
Pardon my brethren's outburst.

270998.「されど 魂の燭台は 聖なる神具。\n なくしたからといって おいそれと\n 代:
However, the Soul Candle is a sacred object. I
cannot simply give you a replacement just
because you lost it.

270999.「私は フォーリオンへ戻り このことを\n 天使長に 報告してこよう。\n 試練:
I shall return to Fourion and report this to
the Archangel. Lada Gart alone shall be
responsible for the trials.

271002.「そなたは まだ 生きている……\n というのは 本当か？\n <pc>。<ye:
Is it true that you are still... alive?
<pc>.<yesno><close>

271003.「……ウソを つくな <pc>。\n そなたから感じる みずみずしい気は\n ま:
Do not lie <pc>. The freshness of the
air you feel is truly that of the living.

271004.「うすうす カンづいて いるだろうが\n 俺は すでに 死んだ身だ。: I'm sure you've noticed that I'm already dead.

271005.「ガートラントで 生涯を終えた 俺の前に\n 導きの天使が 現れ……魂だけを こ:
After a lifetime in Gartlant, an angel
appeared to me... and guided my soul to this
place... and thus I took on a new body.

271006.「死者である俺には 他に 行くところがない。\n しかし <pc> まだ生きてい:
As a dead man, I have nowhere else to go. But
<pc> you who are still alive, you
are not like that.

271007.「俺の 魂の燭台を 貸してやる。: I lend you my Soul Candle.

271008.「これを使えば アストルティアへ帰れるはずだ。\n その 魂の燭台を 好きに使え:
This should get you back to Astoltia. Use that
Soul Candle as you wish.

271009.<pc>は\nラダ・ガートの魂の燭台を 貸してもらった！:
<pc> was lent Lada Gart's Soul
Candle!

271010.「俺は 四天の星巡りを続けるつもりだ。\n もしも そなたが……:
I will continue my Four Heavenly Trials. If
you...

271012.「もしも そなたも 試練に挑むならば\n 魂の燭台を 探しださねばならん。\n:
If you too are to take part in the trials, you
must find the Soul Candle. Come to the Trial
Gate.

274562.お店などでも買えるもの\nモほろのてりすり １\nくんてん十こモで １:
What you can buy in stores and other places
Mohoro no terisuri 1
Kunten Jukkomode 1

286037.ラダ・ガートと名乗る人物は\nそなえの場という所へ 向かったようだ。\nラダ・ガ:
A man named Lada Gart has gone ahead to a
place called...the Place of Preparation. You
should follow him there.
